div.p: Effects of temperature on emergency department visits for acute kidney injury by subgroups in Seoul, South Korea, from 2010 to 2014. The overall associations are estimated as odds ratios (ORs) with 95% confidence intervals per 1 °C increase in temperature. Adjusted for relative humidity, air pressure, and PM 10 in the model. Abbreviations: AKI, acute kidney injury; < 65, < 65 years of age; 65+, ≥ 65 years of age; HD, hypertension disease; DB, diabetes
